scripts.browserify: browserify scripts/site.js -o public/scripts/site.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.build:js: npm run eslint && npm run browserify
scripts.watch: nodemon -e js,scss,jsx -w server.js -w scripts/**/*.* -w scss/**/*.scss -x 'npm run build:js && npm run build:scss && node server.js'
scripts.start: npm run build:scss && npm run build:js && node server.js
